intro: Stenostomum abbreviatum subsp. obcordatum, commonly known as the narrow-mouthed geranium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Geraniaceae family and is characterized by its compact, low-growing habit. The plant features showy, five-petaled flowers that are typically pink or red in color. Its leaves are heart-shaped and have a distinctive, slightly toothed margin. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in rocky or sandy habitats.
